title: Welcome to JEBY's Design World
aboutDescription: We are a passionate design team dedicated to creating unique visual experiences.
successMessage: Your message has been sent successfully!
errorMessage: An error occurred while sending the message. Please try again later.
companyIntroText: We are a technology company focused on innovation and excellence, committed to providing the highest quality solutions for our clients. Since our establishment, we have been constantly pursuing technological advancement and service improvement.
ourMissionText: Our mission is to improve people's lives through technological innovation and bring positive change to the world. We believe that through continuous learning and progress, we can overcome any challenge and achieve the impossible.
valueInnovation: Innovation: We constantly explore new ideas and technologies
valueIntegrity: Integrity: We maintain honesty and transparency in all transactions
valueTeamwork: Teamwork: We believe that through collaboration we can achieve greater goals
valueCustomerFirst: Customer First: We always put our customers' needs first
ourTeamText: Our team consists of professionals from diverse backgrounds, each contributing their expertise and passion to the company's success.
bookingSuccess: You have successfully booked {court} for the {startTime} - {endTime} slot.
bookingCancel: You have cancelled your booking for {court} from {startTime} to {endTime}.
